review:
During 2023 itself l have met the doctor for gum pain doctor advised to go for teeth cleaning since I am afraid of injecting in my teeth l avoided and took some pain killer and antibiotics as a temporary measure for one'year now my teeth got worsen so again l met him he advised for root canal without pain he done it l am  very much satisfied only thing his  he can avoid giving medicine for his patients and if he gave a receipt for the payment l will be very happy because payment receipt his the proof for the patient especially for me l hope he would acknowledge my request 
Thanks for his service

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Fixed appointment with mutual consent.  Started the treatment in time.  Total area and procedure hygienic.  Very considerate during entire procedure. 
 Professional in approach , diagnoses the condition and treats only for the problem and not to unnecessary.  Almost painless and takes feedback and informs about small pain before.  Very reasonable in charges and post treatment advices, dos and don'ts are explained without ambiguity.  Fully satisfied and reliable. Satisfactory experience.  Thanks.

tags: None
review:
Excellent.I am very satisfied with treatment as well as the result.

I had been visiting dentists over the last twenty years.lately many dentists were reluctant to handle my case as I have been a diabetic for thirty years and a cardiac patient for fifteen years.I have undergone a major CABG in 2001and am in the moderate cardiac risk category now.

My case was handled with due care,caution and professionalism without causing any stress or trauma.

I will definitely continue to visit this clinic.

M V Ramani

tags: None
review: I came to Dr.Raghu at laughter dental clinic looking for a good solution for replacing my tooth which was removed long back. He gave all possible options and suggested that a dental implant will best  fulfill my needs and will be the best artificial tooth option. He showed me enough reasons as to why Dental implant will be the best options and so i decided to go ahead with it. I was scared of the thought of drilling and fixing a screw in my jaw bone but to my surprise i felt absolutely no pain at all. ******** *** * ********* *** ** ****** *** ******* ******* *** **** ** **** The clinic too was maintained in a very clean and hygienic state. Must visit clinic and doctor for anyone looking for dental implants.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This is my first experience of extraction of Wisdom Teeth which is partially impacted along with cavities. I visited Doctor Raghu at laughter dental clinic, as soon as he examined the teeth, he suggested me to extract the teeth as it is unnecessary and this is the best possible solution. I was initially scared of pain during extraction, but as Doctor Raghu Promised , I did not feel any pain during the entire procedure. ********* ****** *** patient friendly always. I would recommend the doctor always.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I went to Dr. Raghu's clinic for cleft palate treatment though he is not directly involved in my treatment but he told me how he will be assisting the odontologist for my treatment. I am yet to attend some more sessions with doc and odontologist.
His expertise is dealing with the issues related to gums, and other teeth problem but for structuring the teeth odontologist is needed. It was my first meeting with him and I found his basic consultation fee is reasonable.
But as a customer what I observed that the receptionsit didn't tell me the actual consultation fee which later Dr. Raghu himself clarified so before asking fee from receptionist just confirm with Dr. himself.
As I am going to attend some more appointment with him so I will keep posting my reviews may be it will be helpful for cleft palate patients.

tags: None
review:
The doctor is very Patient ..keeps us informed about the entire procedure so we also feel safe in his hands...! Trust worthy ...not like some doctors who will buy you into getting a treatment which you could have avoided in the first place..When he says you have to do a certain treatment, he will show you enough evidences to let yourself know the situation and presents you with multiple options to solve the issue. The place is also very hygenic ! 

Beyond all this its the comfort level the doc establishes with the patient that makes you want to visit him again!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Treatment is fine. Most friendly doctor. More than ten years we (our family) are going to this doctor. Super sincere and punctual.

tags: None
context: Dental Crowns,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Cavities,
review: I had a pain in my wisdom tooth and i consulted one of the famous dentist in tnagar, they suggested to replace with implantation since the tooth was severly damaged. I just walked out with the report showing another option stating the tooth can either treat with crown or implant with new one. After a month i felt pain and i consulted Dr Raghu (laughter dental) . I felt very comfortable with the way he explain how this could be treated better to save the tooth . He suggested for a cap with root canal treatment, with the three visit the entire treatment was successfully completed . I felt very comfortable with the treatment. Personally I suggest this doctor for dental treatment. Very nice human being .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Surgery was adviced and Dr. Ragul saw to that I feel comfortable and gave perfect advice , clarifying all my  doubts. Follow up after surgery also was very good and explained  the symptoms and recovery span in detail.  Friendliness towards patient and moral support is much needed and we got it perfectly from our dentist.  Thanks to the calm and firm doc

I've already recommended this clinic to my neighbours, relatives and people at my workplace

review: I went to Dr.Raghu with the problem of bleeding gums. i also had many teeth shaking and without any gum covering. All my teeth were in very bad condition. The bleeding has completely stopped and the teeth which were shaking also are strong now. All this done at a very reasonable cost too.  Glad i came to Laughter Dental Clinic and saw Dr.Raghu.
